'''Purpur blocks''' are decorative [[block]]s that can be crafted with popped chorus fruit and are naturally generated in [[End city|End cities]] and [[End City#End ship|End ships]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
The suitable tool to break purpur block is [[pickaxe]]. Purpur block needs to be broken using a pickaxe, otherwise the breaking time will increase and the block drops nothing.
{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Purpur Block|link=none|Pickaxe|Wood}}
Purpur block drops itself when it's destroyed.

=== Natural generation ===
Purpur blocks can be found naturally as part of [[End City|End cities]] and [[End City#End ship|End ships]].

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting

}}

== Usage ==
Purpur blocks are primarily decorative [[block]]s, similar to other [[bricks|brick]]-type blocks. They can also be used to craft different variants of the block. 

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage|Purpur Block}}

=== Stonecutting ingredient ===
{{Stonecutting
|showname=1
|Purpur Block
|Purpur Slab, 2;Purpur Stairs;Purpur Pillar
}}

=== Note Blocks ===
Purpur blocks can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
